heading: HR00667
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY  IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE ALLEGED CLAIM OF SMMT-TIM 2016, INC. (SMARTMATIC) THAT IT HAS THE RIGHT TO ENFORCE THE "CONSIDERED-SOLD" PROVISION OF ITS TWO (2) LEASE CONTRACTS WITH OPTION TO PURCHASE (OTP), ENTERED INTO WITH THE COMMISSION ON ELECTIONS (COMELEC) FOR THE CONDUCT OF THE MAY 9, 2016 NATIONAL AND LOCAL ELECTIONS, WHICH WOULD RESULT IN THE AUTOMATIC TRANSFER OF OWNERSHIP OF 97,366 OPTICAL MARK READER MACHINES (OMRs), IN ADDITION TO THE 83,040 PRECINCT COUNT OPTICAL SYSTEM (PCOS) MACHINES PREVIOUSLY PURCHASED
status: Pending with the Committee on SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS since 2017-01-24
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00667
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEES TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE ALLEGED CLAIM OF SMMT-TIM 2016, INC. (SMARTMATIC) THAT IT HAS THE RIGHT TO ENFORCE THE "CONSIDERED-SOLD" PROVISION OF ITS TWO (2) LEASE CONTRACTS WITH OPTION TO PURCHASE (OTP), ENTERED INTO WITH THE COMMISSION ON ELECTIONS (COMELEC) FOR THE CONDUCT OF THE MAY 9, 2016 NATIONAL AND LOCAL ELECTIONS, WHICH WOULD RESULT IN THE AUTOMATIC TRANSFER OF OWNERSHIP OF 97,366 OPTICAL MARK READER MACHINES (OMRs), IN ADDITION TO THE 83,040 PRECINCT COUNT OPTICAL SYSTEM (PCOS) MACHINES PREVIOUSLY PURCHASED
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BRAVO, ANTHONY M., Ph.D.
DATE FILED : 2017-01-11
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Bertiz (059 2017-01-18)2. Belaro (063 2017-01-30)
3. Lopez (B.) (063 2017-01-30)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS ON 2017-01-24
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-01-16;
